body.p:
230
May 6th 4.
Genl. L. Thomas
Adjutant General U. S. A.
Washington, D. C.
Sir,
I am instructed by the Governor to request that. H. O. Newman. private in Compy. F. 60" Indiana Vols be discharged to enable him to accept a Commission as Quarter Master in a Kentucky Regiment.

Respy.
Your obed. Servt.
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
